entry.title: Employee Skill and Business Needs
entry.content:
You are a proud programmer, you know Ruby and there is no programming language like it, and all of a sudden you are caught up in a situation thats unrelated to you. Sales of the software slumps and your boss yells at your team. You don’t know what’s happening, but you are made to work hard, atleast sit in your office, make some cold marketting calls. What you must do? The best answer is to leave the business and find something else.

I find not so easy as a programer and as an artist that businesses are not able to understand ones skills and are unable to utilize ones talent. Imagine you are an author in 1960’s, you write a novel, a publisher likes it and pays for you to complete it. You complete it and goback to him, then he says that as a writer you must understand the publishing business, you say you do, then he shows a press machine and tells you to operate it. Imagine how stupid it will be?

If you think its absurd to tell the writer to operate the press machine, you should think how absurd Info Tech companies are operating in India and around the world. People with money seem to have no clue how to run a company. People have left programming a while ago and seem to forget how to be a programmer, they seem to forget the pressures programmer faces.

Its like press or publishing house been run by a person who doesn’t know what it means to be a writer.

entry.title: Unfair expectations
entry.content:
I am consulting for a company now in Python web development. My team is in a state where it does not know what HTTP 500 error is. That too one is 10 year experienced developer and another is 4. I raised an alarm that we may not make it this sprint, and what I get as a reward? It was told to me that I am been projected as a great guy who will fix things up, a kind of guy who will not fail, a kind of Rommel under Nazi’s and hence I must make things to work. I was told I am granted all powers which means I can torture any one I want to get things done. Thats far far away from who I am.

These type of expectations put me down. I know who and what I am more than anyone else (may be Google knows more as it spies on me all time) and I know my capabilities, I know my laziness and how an hurricane would not move me when I am lazy. I know what I can do and what I cannot. And some one places a blind expectation on me and that person controls my earnings I surely don’t know what to do.

Its not just in profession, its in society. A engineering mishap in my street led to water stagnation. Some one had built an elevated barrier that obstructs the flow of rain water to nearby pond. People in my street came up with an idiotic idea for flood prevention, by elevating our road which would give us dry land but just would push this problem further. When I pointed out we need a drain and not more barrier I became a villain, but few people realized my logic and told me to run for elections! Damn!!! I ain’t do this for power and popularity, I am just raising a problem that my common sense put up to me. Thats it!!!

And not just society too, my family thinks I am a superman, some one who can do my office work, attend family functions and a person like Gandhi who lives for others than myself. Months ago my refusal to attend a family function led to a torrent of blames and politics. People simply fail to grasp its not wise to attend a function 100’s of kilometers away that too on an inconvenient time. My request to attend function on another day at a good time that suits me was rejected and I was villanized.

Frankly I don’t know what to do with these humans. They constantly need me to boost up their image and wealth. They would trade my brand shamelessly for their gains. I feel I am becoming more of a show piece, a piece of carbon thats been called a diamond and sold for millions when I am just what I am. I am a man who loves to live in peace, not any more, not any less.

entry.title: Why not MSP rather than CTC?

link.title: Why not MSP rather than CTC?

entry.content:
Your company cares about you. It has given you the opportunity to succeed right? And they make your life better and simple right? Okay in that case why don’t your I.T company say that this is the Minimum Salary Paid (MSP) paid to you rather than you are a Cost To The Company (CTC)?

Well, why am I proposing this. Its simple. CTC is a degrading term. It means that you are costing that company, possibly not worth it. Well, that what it really means. You are an liability rather than an asset. Customer brings in money and magically it turns into profit, and you bite away those profits being an cost to and rather not an asset to the company.

Companies that truly care about people should not advertise that if you are employed and it costs the company so much, saying that you cost a bite out of their fortune, rather they must praise your worth. Companies must say that you are worth so much, so this is the minimum salary that we can pay you. That means at the end of working for that year your account will have that much amount credited by the company. And that is a minimum amount. It can go up and not down. This means that your minimum worth is so much and maximum is yet to be explored!

Wouldn’t that be nice?

entry.title: Water logging problem in Skylab Avenue Sithalapakkam

link.title: Water logging problem in Skylab Avenue Sithalapakkam

entry.content:
In Sithalapakkam, we the residents did a stupid thing out of panic. In third street Skylab Avenue, due to an construction, water levels started to rise up during November rains. The residents fought against people who blocked natural water flow and broke the construction which was a good thing, but then for some reason panic set in. Rather than thinking of building a channel for water to drain into Sithalapakkam lake, the residents of 3rd street started to collect money to rise up the road level.

Yes raising up the road level will prevent water from coming in, but till what limit? Shouldn’t water be let to flow along down the land in efficient manner than damming it? Now Water stagnates. Stagnates like hell before the place where road level has been risen.

To make matters worst, the water has no place to drain and it stagnates on a piece of land where residents for long had thrown their garbage. The water has turned black, foul and is leaching into soil. The collective action of us has proven to be collective stupidity.

entry.title: News reporter Jebersan threatened by BJP

link.title: News reporter Jebersan threatened by BJP

entry.content:
Its alarming how religious violence is increasing in Tamilnadu. Even during partition of India, Tamilnadu experienced no Hindu and Muslim violence. We people simply did not know the difference, but now it looks like we must rethink things. There are people who want to polarize us so that they can come to power.

Today there was a news in Polimer channel in which Thanthi T.V news person asks Tamilisai (chief of BJP in Tamilnadu) a question. Tamilisai complains about the rising corruption in the state and how politicians have turned a blind to people and how because of that 2 kids have died due to electrocution due to watter logging because of rains. For that Mr. Jebersan ‘why is BJP so against a movie Mersal, but its not showing that much intensity against corruption?’, unable to answer Tamilisai becomes sentimental and flees the spot.

Then comes the drama. BJP cadres threaten and corner Jebersan, they question him how can he ask such a question. What? Bloody hell, when will this BJP realize they operate in India which is a democracy? And you should be able to answer it. Is there room for dumb people like Tamilisai in India or do we want a leader who can make us understand things well?

By answering Jebersons question, BJP could have unearthed an weakness in it, and could have proceed to fix it, instead they simply want to hide it from the external world by threatening others.
